import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useAuth } from '../contexts/AuthContext'; const HomePage: React.FC = () => { const { user } = useAuth(); return (
{/* Hero Section */}

Personalized learning{' '} powered by AI

EduAI creates personalized study materials tailored to your learning style and knowledge level. Get customized explanations, practice questions, and learning resources that adapt to your needs.

{user ? (

) : ( <>

)}
{/* Feature Section */}

Features

A better way to learn

EduAI adapts to your unique learning needs and helps you master any subject.

Personalized Learning

Content adapts to your knowledge level, learning style, and pace. Get materials that are just right for you.

Comprehensive Resources

Study sheets with explanations, examples, practice questions, and supplementary materials all in one place.

Self-Improving AI

The more you use EduAI, the better it gets. Our platform learns from your interactions to provide increasingly effective content.

Diverse Subjects

Access content across a wide range of subjects, from mathematics and science to literature and history.
); }; export default HomePage;
